plugin.name: ‚ö°Ô∏è Quick Capture
plugin.description: Commands to quickly add tasks/todos or general text to NotePlan notes. See website for configuration of special Inbox note.
plugin.author: Jonathan Clark & Eduard Metzger

plugin.commands.name: int
plugin.commands.description: Quickly add a task to your 'üì• Inbox' note

plugin.commands.name: qath
plugin.commands.description: Quickly add a task at the top of a chosen note's heading

plugin.commands.name: qalh
plugin.commands.description: Quickly add text at the top of a chosen note's heading

plugin.commands.name: qad
plugin.commands.description: Quickly append a task to a chosen daily note

plugin.commands.name: qaj
plugin.commands.description: Quickly append text to the Journal in today's note

plugin.commands.name: qpd
plugin.commands.description: Quickly prepend a task to a chosen daily note

plugin.commands.name: qat
plugin.commands.description: Quickly append a task to a chosen project note

plugin.commands.name: qpt
plugin.commands.description: Quickly prepend a task to a chosen project note
